text: Mario Luis Bautista Maulión (4 December 1934 - 27 September 2020) was an Argentina Roman Catholic archbishop. He was born in Buenos Aires. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1960. He was titular bishop of Febiana and was auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rosario, Argentina, from 1988 to 1995 and as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of San Nicolás de los Arroyos, Argentina, from 1995 to 2003. He was archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Paraná, Argentina, from 1995 to 2010. Bautista Maulión died on 27 September 2020 in Rosario, Argentina at the age of 85.Archdiocese of Paraná ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Argentine Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Buenos Aires
title: Mario Luis Bautista Maulión
